title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correctly finding f ′ ( x )

f ( x ) = x 3 − 6 x 2 + p f ' ( x ) = 3 x 2 − 12 x = 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceiqabeaaCkraai aadAgacaGGOaGaamiEaiaacMcacqGH9aqpcaWG4bWaaWbaaSqabeaa caaIZaaaaOGaeyOeI0IaaGOnaiaadIhadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaa GccqGHRaWkcaWGWbaabaGaamOzaiaacEcacaGGOaGaamiEaiaacMca cqGH9aqpcaaIZaGaamiEamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgkHiTi aaigdacaaIYaGaamiEaiabg2da9iaaicdaaaaa@4F1A@

1 point is earned for correctly solving f ′ ( x )=0

3x( x−4 )=0

x=0,x=4

1 point is earned for correctly indicating the location of a maximum and a minimum, with analysis

0/1 if explicitly chooses to work only with a specific value for p

f ′ ( x ) changes sign from positive to negative at x=0

f ′ ( x ) changes sign from negative to positive at x=4

or

f ″ ( x )=6x−12, f ″ ( 0 )=−12, f ″ ( 4 )=12

1 point is earned for correctly finding the maximum and minimum values in terms of p

relative maximum at x=0,f( 0 )=p

relative minimum at x=4,f( 4 )=p−32
